title: Suspended Animation - 29 Drawings of the Same Photograph
medium: Installation of pencil on twenty-nine pieces of paper and video
dimensions:
Frame (each): 9 3/4 x 12 x 1 1/8" (24.8 x 30.5 x 2.9 cm)
Sheet (each): 7 x 9 1/2" (17.8 x 24.1 cm)
Installation (shot in a grid of 5 rows of 5, 1 row of 4 - space 1/2" apart): 61 x 62 x 1 1/8" (154.9 x 157.5 x 2.9 cm)
Component (TV and Plinth - 11 3/4" away from grid of drawings): 42 3/4 x 25 1/8 x 22" (108.6 x 63.8 x 55.9 cm)
credits: The Judith Rothschild Foundation Contemporary Drawings Collection Gift
